Dick Cheney made a surprise appearance Thursday at the Conservative Political Action Committee Convention to present the former two-time defense secretary an award. The vice president joked that Donald Rumsfeld twice served as defense secretary and added that maybe if we give him a third term, he might get it right. Dick Cheney also drew laughs when he wondered aloud if Donald Rumsfeld may have more influence on Mr. Barack Obama than the president's current advisers.
